ab22676e-e918-4fdd-b75c-8922c98275ed.content: Reclassified archive-derived subtask entries by semantics: historical summaries now tracked as progress (done). Subtask is reserved for child actionable items only.

3dcb431e-0753-4ccc-863e-19c976fec144.content: Node semantics corrected: archive history no longer represented as subtask. task/subtask now reserved for actionable work hierarchy; historical state tracked in progress.

59f2e855-3de4-45d6-8803-66b3c5eebe66.content: Membank migration/status audit complete: archive-history semantics corrected to progress; core story/feature/pattern/progress/memorylink restored in new bank; links rebuilt to parity (25); suite currently at 101 passing tests. Remaining planned work: node stats feature.

a59518db-d324-4e67-857f-9a98c8d0310f.test_scenario: Given a node UID, when remove is called, then node is deleted and index/link references are cleaned
a59518db-d324-4e67-857f-9a98c8d0310f.expected_result: Add membank node remove command with safe storage cleanup semantics

b35c20a5-579f-46cb-98cb-20d5abf22f12.content: Implementing node removal capability with TDD: add command, storage delete path, and reference cleanup.

9d4e8ce6-86f3-43c4-994e-3140809155b9.content: Status audit normalized: stale in-progress entries were closed, semantic reclassification task completed, and current membank state aligned with implemented behavior.

431f3a5c-c715-4176-83fe-551584f21639.content: Continuing remove command implementation: add remove by uid and remove by type with safety guard.

39b05032-dad6-40d2-ba4b-61033fc2212b.content: Cleanup pass: remove obsolete/superseded membank entries and codify cleanup workflow in AGENTS instructions.

d28c34f8-a2f3-4cc7-8529-7cf14c33438b.content: Implement shorthand UID resolution and --last N recent index with TDD.

b9eb07bb-c79d-41a5-af8f-9f5f207fb9ea.content: Implement recent_uid.json + gitignore exclusion + shorthand collision guard (TDD).

cd2b44b9-ceba-4571-8ad1-ecffac52d804.content: Add stronger linking guidance to AGENTS and implement batched link chain operations to reduce IO.

06cf144c-e70c-4dbc-96bf-99467b0afaf4.content: Remove migration section from AGENTS membank instruction.

b461d598-c23a-4591-a766-5db53c891854.benefit: Membank path resolution should safely create state under .pvrclawk even when target directories already contain unrelated source files.
criteria: When target directory exists with non-membank content, init does not fail due to structure mismatch.
Membank storage is created under <target>/.pvrclawk consistently.
Existing non-membank files are left untouched.

27b1e7df-b018-42c4-b177-a34a84e51b33.test_scenario: Given an existing directory with arbitrary content, when membank storage is resolved, then it uses the .pvrclawk subpath instead of treating the root as membank storage.
27b1e7df-b018-42c4-b177-a34a84e51b33.expected_result: Expected result: membank init/create paths always resolve to <target>/.pvrclawk when the root does not already match membank layout, preventing failures in source trees.

c399e345-ce74-4c54-a453-f5a3e311ce11.content: Fixed membank path resolution so non-membank --path targets resolve to a .pvrclawk subdirectory; added integration regressions for init and follow-up node commands against populated source directories.

8e73b34c-2524-426d-a67e-a06955f5377f.role: As an agent maintaining membank context
8e73b34c-2524-426d-a67e-a06955f5377f.benefit: I want story nodes to be written in user-story format so node creation stays user-centered and consistently actionable.
criteria: Story guidance defines persona + goal + benefit structure and distinguishes stories from requirements/tasks.
Story node examples and templates use non-technical, value-oriented language.
Agents preserve acceptance criteria as confirmation of done.

8eaf68e7-1186-4418-b870-2f9211030532.test_scenario: Given membank node creation instructions, when creating story nodes, then guidance enforces user-story semantics with persona, intent, value, and acceptance confirmation.
8eaf68e7-1186-4418-b870-2f9211030532.expected_result: Expected result: docs/instructions explicitly define stories as end-user outcomes (not technical requirements), include template and 3Cs framing, and map existing story command fields to user-story elements.

bad805fe-b14f-40bf-9eee-decb6da42854.content: Updated membank instructions to enforce Agile user-story semantics for story nodes (persona + goal + benefit + confirmation criteria), refreshed README examples, and clarified node add CLI help text for story fields.

b66b55ca-b460-4810-a1c2-5ca0c8641fee.benefit: I want every command group and subcommand to have clear help text so that I can discover and use the CLI without guessing.
criteria: Running --help on each group shows a meaningful group description.
Running --help on each command shows a meaningful command description.
No command displays placeholder or empty help text.

187fbb86-bef3-4c32-be08-35bb6afd90fe.test_scenario: Given each registered Click group and command, when user runs --help, then descriptive help text is present for all entries.
187fbb86-bef3-4c32-be08-35bb6afd90fe.expected_result: Expected result: every group and command has explicit help metadata or docstring surfaced in CLI help output.

356968c4-24e6-4989-9efc-e88c186e8d46.content: Add help text coverage for all CLI groups and subcommands.
